long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Connect to a TapTrack TappyUSB NFC device and perform basic read/write operations on any tag technology the TappyUSB supports. 

This tool allows you to read NDEF messages, detect tags, write URI records, write text records, write multi-record messages, write vCards, emulate NDEF messages, as well as perform some basic batch operations such as locking tags.
